description: Drones are used for crop monitoring, pesticide spraying, fertilizer distribution, and yield estimation in Indian agriculture.
example: Garuda Aerospace deploys agricultural drones across multiple Indian states for precision spraying.

description: Drones are used for last-mile delivery of medicines, vaccines, and essential goods in remote and hard-to-reach areas of India.
example: Drones were used to deliver COVID-19 vaccines in states like Manipur and Nagaland.

description: Drones assist in inspection of bridges, roads, power lines, pipelines, and construction sites by capturing high-resolution aerial data.
example: Government agencies use drones to inspect bridges and highways for structural damage.

description: Drones are used in disaster response for search and rescue, damage assessment, and real-time monitoring of affected areas.
example: Drones have been used during floods in India to locate stranded individuals and assess damage.

description: Law enforcement and security agencies use drones for crowd monitoring, traffic management, and surveillance of sensitive areas.
example: Police departments in Indian cities deploy drones during public events and emergencies.

description: Drones are used for aerial photography and cinematography in films, sports broadcasting, and media production.
example: DGCA-approved drones are used for aerial filming during major sports events.
